sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { BarChart3, TrendingUp, Users, DollarSign, Calendar, Download } from 'lucide-react'; import toast from 'react-hot-toast'; const Analytics: React.FC = () => { const [selectedPeriod, setSelectedPeriod] = useState('30d'); // Mock data - in real app, this would come from your API const analyticsData = { totalUsers: 1247, activeUsers: 892, totalReturns: 1158, completedReturns: 1034, pendingReturns: 124, totalRevenue: 125000, monthlyGrowth: 12.5, userRetention: 78.3, avgProcessingTime: 2.3, successRate: 94.2 }; const monthlyData = [ { month: 'Jan', users: 120, returns: 95, revenue: 12000 }, { month: 'Feb', users: 145, returns: 112, revenue: 14500 }, { month: 'Mar', users: 180, returns: 145, revenue: 18000 }, { month: 'Apr', users: 165, returns: 132, revenue: 16500 }, { month: 'May', users: 200, returns: 168, revenue: 20000 }, { month: 'Jun', users: 235, returns: 189, revenue: 23500 }, { month: 'Jul', users: 220, returns: 175, revenue: 22000 } ]; const topStates = [ { state: 'California', users: 245, returns: 198 }, { state: 'New York', users: 189, returns: 156 }, { state: 'Texas', users: 167, returns: 134 }, { state: 'Florida', users: 143, returns: 118 }, { state: 'Illinois', users: 98, returns: 87 } ]; const returnStatuses = [ { status: 'Completed', count: 1034, percentage: 89.3, color: 'bg-green-500' }, { status: 'Pending', count: 124, percentage: 10.7, color: 'bg-yellow-500' } ]; const formatCurrency = (amount: number) => { return new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', { style: 'currency', currency: 'USD' }).format(amount); }; return (

Analytics Dashboard

Platform performance and user insights.

{/* Key Metrics */}

Total Users

{analyticsData.totalUsers.toLocaleString()}

+{analyticsData.monthlyGrowth}% from last month

Total Returns

{analyticsData.totalReturns.toLocaleString()}

+8.2% from last month

Total Revenue

{formatCurrency(analyticsData.totalRevenue)}

+15.3% from last month

Success Rate

{analyticsData.successRate}%

+2.1% from last month

{/* Monthly Growth Chart */}

Monthly Growth

{monthlyData.map((data, index) => (
{data.month}
{data.users} users
))}
{/* Return Status Distribution */}

Return Status Distribution

{returnStatuses.map((status) => (
{status.status}
{status.count}
{status.percentage}%
))}
{/* Top States */}

Top States by Users

{topStates.map((state) => ( ))}
State Users Returns Conversion Rate
{state.state} {state.users} {state.returns} {((state.returns / state.users) * 100).toFixed(1)}%
{/* Performance Metrics */}
{analyticsData.userRetention}%

User Retention

Users who return within 30 days

{analyticsData.avgProcessingTime} days

Avg. Processing Time

From submission to approval

{analyticsData.activeUsers}

Active Users

Users active in last 30 days

); }; export default Analytics;
